basics.name: Hank (Jung-Han) Wang
basics.label: Data Scientist
basics.summary: Data science enthusiast with a Ph.D. degree in transportation data analysis and a master degree in statistical computing. Had over 5 years of intensive hands-on experiences on data cleaning, statistical analysis from clustering, regression, time series, and machine learning to address business problems using R, SAS, Hadoop, SQL, and Python. I have a strong track record of delivering actionable results and consistently providing data-driven solutions to challenging problems.

work.summary: Led a team to develop statistical models for roadway safety using R and SAS; proactively drafted a proposal from the initial idea and granted $250,000; in charge of statistical modeling for a project to Federal Highway Administration (FHWA) and Florida Department of Transportation (FDOT)
highlights: Developed a comprehensive feature selection function in FHWAâ€™s project based on statistical and engineering concept, drastically improving efficiency and saving 5 hours of manual model feature selection for each trial
Developed an R package for conducting comprehensive before-after studies and cross-section study to fulfill FDOT safety project with graphical user interface using shiny

Published 5 journal articles and 8 presentations in the field of transportation data analysis, 1 traffic safety analysis report for FDOT; frequently utilized cutting edge data mining techniques such as random forestss and neural networks in R & SAS
Developed an R program to batch rename PDF files with the subjects name or other available meta-data.

work.summary: Performed server set up, backup, and maintenance; solved network problems and performed remote and on-site support for 6 companies; improved the average time for problem resolution

courses: Time Series Modeling - Rmarkdown Presentation using reveal.js
Experimental Design - R Program to Find Full Factorial Design
Theoretical Statistics - Probability of Winning Power Ball

education.institution: California State Polytechnic University at Pomona

publications.name: An R Package for Calculation of Crash Modification Factors with Graphical User Interface
publications.publisher: Western Decision Sciences Institute Annual Meeting

publications.name: Estimating Safety Performance Trends over Time for Treatments at Intersections in Florida
publications.summary: This research applied ARIMA time series model to predict trends of safety improvement over time

references.name: Robert Norberg
references.reference: Hank Wang is a great statistician and programmer, but what impressed me the most about working with him was how quickly he learned new things. When we started working together, I asked if he had ever used version control. He had never heard of it, but that night he made his first git commit. Our collaboration took off from there.  He is also very passionate about his work. We've spent weekends together programming, just for fun. His passion for learning truly inspires me to learn as well. All around a fantastic team member to have.
